auth.loginPageLink: Don't have an account? Sign up
auth.registerPageLink: Already have an account? Log in
auth.loginMessage: Please sign in to your account and start the tracking
auth.registerMessage: Please register to create an account and start the tracking

name_first.min: First name must be at least 3 characters at length
name_first.max: First name can't be longer than 256 characters

name_last.min: Last name must be at least 3 characters at length
name_last.max: Last name can't be longer than 256 characters

email.min: This field has to be filled.
email.length: This field must be at least 3 characters at length.
email.existingUser: User with this email already exists

password.min: Password must be at least 8 characters in length
password.max: Password can't be longer than 15 characters
password.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
password.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
password.numeric: Password must contain at least one numeric digit.
password.specialCharacter: Password must contain at least one special character.

confirmPassword.min: Password must be at least 8 characters in length
confirmPassword.max: Password can't be longer than 15 characters
confirmPassword.equality: Confirm password and password are not equal
